GSD.product_version: versions from v4.16 to before v5.10.122
GSD.description:
bpf, arm64: Clear prog->jited_len along prog->jited

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.122 by commit 0cf7aaff290cdc4d7cee683d4a18138b0dacac48, it was introduced in version v4.16 by commit db496944fdaaf2a67d2f60529f5dc23abf809506. For more details please see the references link.
